cu.explanation_en: Setting the ASN.1 verbosity to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration failures and potential runtime issues in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致日誌配置失敗，並在 DU 中造成潛在的運行時問題。
